summary: Use modern Python packaging metadata standard (1.2, PEP 345)
description:
Add a PKG-INFO file as fitting with [http://www.python.org/dev/peps/pep-0345/ PEP 345].

See [http://blog.ziade.org/2012/09/10/dear-django-help-python-packaging/ this blog post] for reference.

Seems to me we can add this metadata file without too much difficulty and make new packaging happy :D
